Foundation Classes

Packages
Package
Description
com.redis.foundation.app
Application management classes (sessions, threads, logging, properties).
com.redis.foundation.crypt
Data hiding utility classes (encryption/decryption).
com.redis.foundation.data
Data object classes (item, document, grid, graph).
com.redis.foundation.ds
Data source management classes (criteria).
com.redis.foundation.io
Data object storage and retrieval classes (XML, JSON, CSV).
com.redis.foundation.mail
Email generation classes (SMTP).
com.redis.foundation.std
Standard utility classes (strings, numerics, files, message hashing).
